exceptions.exn: In environment d : dstatelet h : cohMT d Unable to unify "cohMT d" with "is_true (valid (dstate d))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
d: dstatelet

Goal:
cohMT d -> valid (dstate d)

Premises:
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
cohMT = eq^~ empty_dstatelet : dstatelet -> Prop
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
cohVs : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dsoup d)
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
valid_mt_state = (fun _evar_0_ : true => eq_ind_r [eta is_true] _evar_0_ (valid_unit (union_mapPCM [ordType of nid] heap))) is_true_true : valid (dstate empty_dstatelet)
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
Transitions.s_safe_in : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d
DepMaps.DepMaps.pf : forall (V : Type) (labF : V -> DepMaps.DepMaps.Label) (d : DepMaps.DepMaps.depmap labF), DepMaps.DepMaps.dmDom labF (DepMaps.DepMaps.dmap d)
Transitions.s_safe_coh : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> coh d
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
validL : forall (U : pcm) (x y : U), valid (x \+ y) -> valid x
post_valid : forall s : soup, valid s -> forall m : msg TaggedMessage, valid (post_msg s m).1
consume_valid : forall (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (m : mid), valid s' -> valid (consume_msg s' m)
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
Transitions.s_safe_def : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d msg < -> (exists (b : heap) (pf : Transitions.send_safe s this to d msg), Transitions.send_step pf = Some b)
last_key_dom : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> last_key f \notin dom f -> f = Unit
dom_last_key : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> ~~ empb f -> last_key f \in dom f
hcancelV : forall (A : Type) (x : ptr) (v1 v2 : A) (h1 h2 : heap), valid (x :-> v1 \+ h1) -> x : -> v1 \+ h1 = x : -> v2 \+ h2 -> [/\ v1 = v2, valid h1 & h1 = h2]
mark_other : forall (m m' : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)), valid s' -> (m' == m) = false -> find m' (consume_msg s' m) = find m' s'
cancel : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v1 v2 : V) (f1 f2 : U), valid (pts k v1 \+ f1) -> pts k v1 \+ f1 = pts k v2 \+ f2 -> [/\ v1 = v2, valid f1 & f1 = f2]
valid_fresh' : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V) (i : [ordType of nat]) (w : V), valid (f \+ i \\-> w) -> valid (f \+ fresh (f \+ i \\-> w) \\-> v)
last_keyUnf : forall (V : Type) (f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> last_key f2 <= last_key (f1 \+ f2)
last_keyfUn : forall (V : Type) (f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> last_key f1 <= last_key (f1 \+ f2)
last_fresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V), valid f -> last_key (f \+ fresh f \\-> v) = fresh f
valid_unit : forall U : pcm, valid Unit
valid_fresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V), valid (f \+ fresh f \\-> v) = valid f
find_mark : forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'
validU : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (upd k v f) = cond U k && valid f
validPtUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k v \+ f) = [&& cond U k, valid f & k \notin dom f]
mt_nodes = (fun _evar_0_ : [::] =i [::] => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : seq [ordType of nid] => _pattern_value_ =i [::]) _evar_0_ (dom0 (union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap))) (fun x : [ordType of nid] => erefl (x \in [::])) : dom (dstate empty_dstatelet) =i [::]
consumeUn : forall (s' : soup) (i : mid) (mm : msg TaggedMessage) (j : mid), valid (s' \+ i \\-> mm) -> consume_msg (s' \+ i \\-> mm) j = (if i == j then s' \+ i \\-> mark_msg mm else consume_msg s' j \+ i \\-> mm)
valid_mt_soup = (fun _evar_0_ : true => eq_ind_r [eta is_true] _evar_0_ (valid_unit (union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)))) is_true_true : valid (dsoup empty_dstatelet)
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Msg : forall mtype : Type, mtype -> nat -> nat -> bool -> msg mtype
